title: Spicy potatoes
ingredients: ['3 large Maris Piper potatoes', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '1/2 medium red onion, chopped', '2 green chillies, de-seeded and chopped', '8 to 10 curry leaves, fresh or dried', '1/2 teaspoon ginger paste', '1/2 teaspoon garlic paste', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 medium tomato, chopped', '30g shelled peas, fresh or frozen', 'salt to taste']
